Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(toolbar\): Refactor annotation toolbar into reusable controls \(XIP-0023\)

Create AnnotationToolbar and EditorToolsPanel controls for separation:
- AnnotationToolbar: Contains all annotation drawing tools, property
  controls \(color, width, font size, strength, shadow\), and actions
  \(undo, redo, delete, clear\). Includes ExtensionContent slot for
  injecting additional controls.
- EditorToolsPanel: Contains Editor-specific tools \(Crop, CutOut,
  Background, Effects\) excluded from Region Capture Overlay.
- EditorView: Updated to use new controls with slot composition,
  injecting EditorToolsPanel into AnnotationToolbar''s ExtensionContent.

This enables future reuse of AnnotationToolbar in the Region Capture
Overlay for annotating screenshots during capture.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
